website_summaries.verdict: An affordable BB cream with clean ingredients that is ideal for those who want a very natural look.
pros: Contains mineral pigments that adjust to skin's color
Moisturizing formula provides a dewy finish and a natural-looking glow
cons: Those looking for more coverage will be disappointed

customer_reviews.title: I use this because I hate wearing foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy coverage product. I use this because I hate wearing foundation, but still like to have something give me a helping hand in looking (somewhat) human. I am very pale, but have some pink and red spots on my face. It doesn't cover your acne, but I've found that it definitely evens out your skin tone and helps to reduce redness. It smells very pleasant as well and, with a little bit of concealer on the high plains of your face, gives a nice natural look.
customer_reviews.author: FeatherpinTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely a primer not a BB cream. I love primers because they don't add color, just a good base for your makeup to stick. What i love most about this product is the chemical and toxin free!!! Found product on Think Dirty app,rated completely safe with no toxins or harmful chemical AT ALL!!!!! I am completely in love. Price is amazing for what you get. I will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Meh. 😕
